game.name: Planets and Pancakes
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Professor Pancake, the only creator of Pancakes, has been kidnapped by alien thugs and trapped across dangerous dimensions. Gather a crew of up to 5 Astronauts, survive terrifying Aliens, and rescue him before the universe loses its Pancakes forever!
